Eigentlich mochte ich Dead by Daylight und es wird sicher noch Tage geben, an denen ich es wieder spielen werde, aber ich kann das Spiel keinen Neueinsteigern mehr empfehlen, da die Preispolitik von dem Spiel einfach nur noch lächerlich ist.

Das Problem ist, dass jeder lizenzierte Killer, sprich Micheal Myers, Freddy Krüger und Co. ausschlißlich mit Echtgeld erwerbar sind. 

Andere Killer kann man zwar mit Freispielen, dies erfordert jedoch absurd viel Spielzeit.
Gerade da man sich entscheiden muss, ob man lieber einzelne Talente/Perks freischaltet oder eben gewünschten Charackter.

Desweiteren muss man Angst haben, dass ein Charackter irgendwann gar nicht mehr erwerbar ist, wie zuletzt beim Demogorgon von Stranger Things, welcher aus Lizenzgründen nicht mehr verkauft werden darf.

Desweitern gibt es mittlerweile ein großes Questlog, wo ihr sehr spezielle Aufgaben erledigen müsst. Gut, dass man für einige Aufgaben Charackter XY benötigt, den man entweder noch nicht freigeschaltet oder gekauft hat... Also holt das mal lieber nach!

Mit dem Questlog schaltet ihr übrigens Belohnungen frei.. Kosmetische, hauptsächlich Anhänger mit denen ihr vollgespammt werdet, aber keine Sorge, so viel ist das gar nicht, wenn ihr nicht den Premiumbattlepass kauft.

Falls ihr doch den ganzen Plunder haben wollt und euch für die Premiumversion des Battlepasses entscheidet, habt ihr Glück! Innerhalb des Passes bekommt ihr den kompletten Kaufpreis des Passes als Ingamewährung zurück, sodass ihr euch den nächsten auch sichern könnt... vorausgesetzt ihr schafft es so viel Zeit in der Season zu investieren.
Den kompletten Questlog mit teils absurden Aufgaben abzuarbeiten reicht nämlich leider nicht aus.. stellt euch lieber drauf ein nur noch Dead by Daylight zu spielen!

Desweiteren gibt es noch Cosmetics für alle Characktere $$$

Das ist das Hauptargument, warum ich das Spiel heutzutage nicht mehr kaufen würde. Abgesehen davon, dass es mittlerweile eh schwer für Neueinsteiger ist, da das Spiel weniger Casual ist, als es mal war.

It's been 4 years since I first wrote this review, I've grown older and more experienced at this game, so I figured i would make a quick edit to my original points and tweak them to be more accurate to my current beliefs, I will leave the original review alone:
1. Killer ability similarity is increasing as time is going on, we now have 2 killers who have wave-like ranged attacks that go through pallets, both from famous Japanese survival horror games.
2. Survivors are not defenceless, that was just a fallacy, in fact the killers can often feel like they are underpowered at times. Especially with the recent release of boon totems, those things are nuts.
3. The maps are well designed aesthetically, they are getting better, but some are very survivor sided. Oh and the fog doesn't really do anything anymore, especially with the graphical improvements
4. Both survivor and killer can level up.
Overall, probably more of a 7/10 rather than an 8/10, but my original points towards the overall gameplay experience is largely the same. It can suck real bad to play, but damn if this game doesn't put a smile on my face.


I absolutely love this game...overall. And I know I gave away the final verdict straight away but hear my points I beg of you.
Dead by daylight is an online multiplayer, 4 vs 1 competitive game. Sometimes. It's also a horror game so yay! I have a lot of things to say but i'm going to start with the pros:
1.The gameplay. There is tons of replayability. I literally spent 8 hours on this game in the first few days. The game offers a independent levelling system as in you level each character independently from one another. This offers amazing amounts of grinding destiny style, various unlocks and completely unique characters. Also the game is just really fun to play both as a multiplayer game and a horror game.
2. The killer's abilities. When I say the abilities, I mean the thing that is unique to the killer. And I know that a lot of them are extremely similar (more on that at the cons section). But, I still love to play as the killers. Their abilities are mainly varied like the ability to place bear traps that incapacitate the survivors or throwing hatchets at a surivivor to instantly deal as much damage as the melee attack.
3. The maps. The maps are all very well designed from the ruins of a hospital to the decrepit husk of an old family farm. these maps come with this fog that makes it harder to see for both the killers and the survivors. The maps are just fabulous, 'nuff said.

However that is pretty much the end of the pros. Now lets move on to the Cons:
1. The killer's abilities. I know I already talked about this but just hear me out, alright. So you know how I said that they can be similar. Well lets give an example (This is from what i've seen I haven't got any DLC), The Hillbilly is a charcter that uses a hammer and a chainsaw. When you hold mouse 2 or whatever button you assigned, the killer charges with his chainsaw. Now, lets look at The Cannibal (Leatherface). A killer with a hammer (correct me if i'm wrong) and a chainsaw. When you hold the button you assigned or mouse 2 he charges with his chainsaw. See the similarity.
2. The survivors. I guess the point of a multiplayer game that pits one team against another is to make both teams enjoyable to play. The survivors are quite defenseless and the killer usually feels very overpowered. Now, by no means is this always the case, but the killers have a way to level up, speaking of which...
3. The levelling system. My first gripe is once you reach level 10. you can't get some abilities making it hard to get the items you want. Second gripe: why can the killers level up to the same extent the survivors can? The killer perks are insane. Some allow you to get rid of the terror radius (the area that people are alerted to your presence), some to increase the difficulty of skill checks (when doing something as a survivor, most of the time a prompt will come to tell you to press space or your assigned button at a certain time, failing will result in the killer being alertered and your progress will be set back.) or Increase the killers attack damage (normally 2 hits and you're in the dying stage).Annoying AF.

Overall however, most of these can be fixed and the game is still so much fun to play. I would recommend this game to anyone looking for a scare or a fun Co-op multiplayer game. What? Oh, a number rating out of 10 yeah. 8/10 easily.
(I do know it can get repetitive, so don't comment that please)

玩了1000+小时，第一次为steam游戏写评测，我不说这个游戏是否迎合大家的口味，但是我感觉杀鸡已经是我的一部分了，这个游戏需要不断学习，也许你开始玩着会很吃力，但是你要坚持下去，每个人皇屠皇都是在无数次失败之后慢慢成长来的。
如果你感觉队友不给力或者屠夫很强，那就请多练极限内圈以及转点拉距，蛇皮走位不说百分之百成功，但是如果有一次你蛇皮成功，你会非常的有成就感，也许一次蛇皮就足够救你的命。
如果你感觉人类很强，车队很强，你需要学习各种套路，根据屠夫的特点，尽可能的提高压迫感。护士的上限几乎没有，所以想成为最强屠夫请练护士，其次就是电锯，这个屠夫上手比护士更难，上限也就比护士低了一点。所以请努力！
抱怨并不能给你带来任何东西，你所需要的就是学习学习再学习。
最后，希望大家游戏愉快。心态决定一切！！！

[h1] Dead by Daylight - вечная проблема с балансом  [/h1] 

Много говорить не буду. Но разрабам стоило отказаться от *обучающих* перков. 
У каждого Маньяка и Сурва есть свои 3 уникальных перка. В последствии, ты можешь эти перки передать другим персонажам. НО есть одна проблема. Если маньяки отличаются друг от друга, то сурвы нет. 
Сурв бес перков - обычный человек. вся уникальность заканчивается на перках. В итоге большинство бегают с топ перками. Некоторые перки стоило оставить уникальными. 
Раз Мег спортсменка - оставить спринт как уникальный. Клодетт врач - самохил. Осколок тоже можно было бы оставить только у Лори. то есть оставить хотя бы 1 уникальный перк не передаваемый. Вспоминаю, как маньяков бомбило от осколка. даже начали конкретно кемперить даже тех. у кого его нет. 
А так. может и не было бы такого хаоса ,и игралось намного интереснее. 
Когда у персов есть уникальность. это всегда интересно. Но несмотря на постоянные проблемы с балансом, игра затягивала, в ней есть что-то притягательное.
Super!
Игра была бы самой лучшей, если бы избавились от мансеров и кемперов
